short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide various interface elements on X (Twitter).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURES
- Removes the 'For you' tab.
- Hides other distracting elements.
- Provides the option to use 'Time Lock'

The default interface of X (Twitter) is designed to keep you on the platform as long as possible. Take back control by using our adjusted interface for healthy and responsible use of the best social media platform.

Stay connected to your favorite creators and journalists without dealing with distracting content. 

With this simple extension you can use X in moderation and stay productive and focus on what you intend to do.

___________________________________________

PRIVACY: This extension does NOT gather any data for commercial purposes.

SUPPORT: Send a message to 'timboon808@gmail.com' for support.

UPDATES: We will roll out updates whenever necessary within hours.
